## ICallControl.hold() method

Tells the device whether an active call was put on hold or a held up call was resumed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hold(shouldHold: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  shouldHold | boolean | <code>true</code> when a call gets put on hold, <code>false</code> when it is resumed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Exceptions

If a call lock was not acquired prior to execution. See [ICallControl.takeCallLock()](./jabra-js.icallcontrol.takecalllock.md) for more details.
